p: PHS has been used as a folk medicine for a long time in both oriental and western counties [ 25]. In this study, we conducted a comprehensive assessment of PHS toxicity using C. elegans. We evaluated the PHS toxicity of L4 stage for prolonged exposure. This period was chosed to coincide with the developmental stage when the number of germ cells reached its maximum, but before the embryonic membrane became impermeable [ 26].
